      • collide

        public abstract boolean collide(java.util.List<java.util.List<GameObject>> map,
                                int direction)
        Used to detect collision between entities and obstacles/pathblocks
        Parameters:
        map - Current map
        direction - Integer value representing the direction to check the collision.
        Returns:
        True if a collision occurs, false if it does not.
